tickets.description: Going for/with your kid? It's free!
Experience the magic and excitement of Gaudia Itinera! Perfect for all ages, this ticket grants you full access to a day of unforgettable fun.
Your time is almost over, why pay full price?
The government already mandates so much money from you, so why not a little less mandating?
Since you can't access half the park, might as well pay half the price.
